Everton Rewards FAQ’s

How do I earn Rewards:

When you shop online using either our mobile browser or your PC browser with our extension then you will be able to see which retail partner you can earn from these partners will have the everton logo displayed next them, Simply shop as you would normally and we will update you as to how much you have earned.

How do I get the PC or Mobile app:

You can access our apps from the everton site directly or from googleplay and itunes just search for “Everton Rewards”

Where can I see my account details:

If you click on the everton icon in the browser toolbar this will take you to your user profile and account details.

How do I redeem my rewards:

Select the redeem rewards and we will issue you with a discount code to use at checkout.

Where can I spend my earned rewards:

You can redeem earned rewards again everton merchandise in their online store or through kitbag.

Can I earn extra points without shopping:

Yes there are various ways to play within the app and earn extra points: use widget on the right side of your screen to earn more.

How do I contact you if I have a question:

Just email us to vitali@loyalty-rewarded.com or contact us here.

I have forgotten my username or password:

It’s easy, just go and click the forgot my password link on the sign in page. We’ll send you an email with the next step.
Not had an email? Please check if it’s in your spam folder and then add us to your contacts for future updates.

Do I need to sign up:

Not at first but you need to sign up when you want to redeem your earnings. it only takes 20 seconds, less if you use facebook.

Why sign up?

In order to redeem your rewards and interact with friend through the app.

What does “install everton rewards app” mean?

This means that in one click you can download our browser extension which works on Google Chrome, Firefox and Safari (and Internet Explorer shortly) or our android browser app and ios browser then every time you shop online with our app, and you don’t have to be signed up or signed in for it to work!

Does it cost me to download or use it?

Nope. Not a penny, it is the retailer who makes the payment to your everton rewards account at no extra cost to you. This payment is built into the price of their products anyway so a £20 kettle from Amazon still costs you £20. Amazon then credit approx £1 to your reward account.
